channel.title: Giant Rat Neutral Killer
channel.description:
Passives:
Evasive - Immune to death at night, as well as most forms of occupation and redirection. Additionally can visit people in jail.
Feast on the Dead - Every time someone dies you gain a spawn.
Day Ability - Stalk (1 Spawn): Your spawn will follow someone, and tell you who they visit each night. If at least three stalked people visit the same target, your spawn will attack that target; the attack cannot be healed and bypasses death immunity.
Day Ability - Plague (1 Spawn) - Poison a player. They will die in two nights if they aren’t healed and have their night immunity byapassed.
Night Ability:
Devour - Select two targets. You will attack the one that less stalked people visit. If there’s a tie, visit your first target.
Some notes - The point of the Giant rat is to amass information about your opponents, avoid people so you don’t get hit by knights, observers. He has poison to kill immunes, and punishes multiple people for visiting a target (I’m looking at you prince). I feel like he needs another night ability, but I can’t think of a good one so I’ll leave it.

I thought it would make merc sad and rats aren’t fireproof.

item.title: Giant Rat Neutral Killer

item.description:
What about bypassing merc guards/firewalls?

Read full topic

item.title: Giant Rat Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: Biperspectival
item.description:
Thanks for the feedback. I fixed some of it. On the topic of hearing jail chat, I didn’t include it since you can visit jailed players. That means that the jailed player can’t be healed/guarded from your attacks, so if you ise jail chat to guess their number (not hard since default logs include their name), you get a guaranteed kill.

Read full topic

Made me feel a bit lonely

item.title: Giant Rat Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
Modern Warfare 3 Rank up song

Biperspectival:

Evasive - Immune to death at night, as well as most forms of occupation and redirection. Additionally can visit people in jail.

Lol, can visit people in jail. Can you hear their conversations as well? Plz?

Biperspectival:

Feast on the Dead - Every time someone dies you gain a spawn.

Maybe change it to people you kill?
Dunno, if people get spawns any ways then you basically get infinite Uses.

Biperspectival:

Day Ability - Stalk (1 Spawn): Your spawn will follow someone, and tell you who they visit each night. If at least three stalked people visit the same target, your spawn will attack that target; the attack cannot be healed and bypasses death immunity.

Anti D1 claiming prince Ability. Cool.

Biperspectival:

Day Ability - Plague (1 Spawn) - Poison a player. They will die in two nights if they aren’t healed and have their night immunity byappsed.

Bypasses*
Besides that, seems ok. Make it so it shows as bleeding/poisoning depending on game(though it won’t tell you)

Biperspectival:

Devour - Select two targets. You will attack the one that less stalked people visit.

You mean that by whoever gets visited less? What if they don’t get visited at all/visited by same number of people?

Anyway, cool idea

Read full topic
